title: Warlord's Bloodlust not working
body: Yeah so all the keystones keep breaking. Can we fix them thanks.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=esreveR,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=14LqEQcF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-18T13:13:57.251+0000)
>
> Warlord's Bloodlust has been hotfixed to work only on Champions.

Yeah it wasn't working on anything for a few hours.
